name: Love and Passion: Episodes
description:
Love and Passion is a free interactive story game where you can be the main character in your romantic love story. Dress up in beautiful outfits, slip into a different role and find your Mister Right while diving into the great era of Victorian England. Make choices that matter and choose your path in every story - with every decision the outcome will differ.

*Customize your character: Choose your character design and pick your favorite style! Customize your hair, outfits, and accessories. It is your choice how you want to look.

*Make your choice: Change fate through your choices and control what happens next in the stories. Shape your own love story in each episode, make decisions that will affect the ending, and be the master of your destiny in this passion-filled journey.

*Read thrilling chapters: Immerse yourself in diverse stories, the options are endless! Read through the pages from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories - from flirty to romantic and passionate. Let your secret dreams become true!

*Dress up: Wear the most beautiful outfits and choose your character look from a wide range of hairstyles, dresses, and accessories. Go high fashion with exquisite ball gowns and sparkling jewelry or be tempting in silk and lace.

*Develop relationships: Fall in love and experience deep relationships with your favorite characters - will they be friends, rivals, or lovers? Enjoy the greatest love episodes of all time.

*The great Victorian-era: Explore romantic Victorian England. Be part of the upper class, meet all kinds of gentlemen and find your perfect match.

Love and Passion lets players experience the greatest love stories of all time by making choices through interactive story chapters full of love, romance, adventure, and drama like;

Pride & Prejudice: In Victorian times, you find yourself embroiled in a love triangle between a prideful noble and a military bad boy! Which one will you pick?

Season of Lust: When you become the lady companion of the Earl of Danford’s sister, the season takes a naughty turn.
